summary: adds a kvatch guard shield in the "champion of cyrodiil museum" look around the house and ya should find it XD its like the armor there ya have to steal it
descriptionHtml:
adds a kvatch guard shield in the "champion of cyrodiil museum" look around the house and ya should find it XD its like the armor there ya have to steal it its located on some boxes 

ps im lookin for help to make this shield work with dual sheath redux if ya can make it let me know or send me the patch and ill update this mod with it along with credit
author: FlamerunnerFirestom
